name: Almond Tofu
desc: A dessert made out of almond. It has a silky-smooth texture with a long-lasting aroma of almond. It's named tofu only because of its tofu-like shape.

customize.name: Recipe: Almond Tofu
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Almond Tofu.

customize.name: Milk
customize.desc: Sweet and fragrant cow's milk. Don't waste a single drop, not even that one rolling down your chin.

customize.name: Sugar
customize.desc: A seasoning derived from Sweet Flowers. Has the power to give both energy and happiness.

customize.name: Almond
customize.desc: A seed with a peculiar fragrance that gives food a refreshing taste.

customize.name: Delicious Almond Tofu
customize.desc: A dessert made from ground almonds. It has the exquisite look and texture of a piece of white jade, and could pass as an art piece â€” so much so that you could not entertain the idea of actually eating it.

customize.name: Suspicious Almond Tofu
customize.desc: A dessert made from ground almonds. The almond milk is chilled without being properly ground and strained. You can only lie to yourself that its rough texture is what makes it special.

customize.name: Xiao
customize.desc: A yaksha adeptus who defends Liyue. Also heralded as the "Conqueror of Demons" and "Vigilant Yaksha."

customize.name: "Sweet Dream"
customize.desc: Xiao's specialty. His dream is very simple, and it is merely a lovely dream.

desc.text:
Inn Notice
Our inn's signature dish is Almond Tofu, which has a delightful sweetness and savory aftertaste. It is like a cool summer wind or refreshing mountain stream on the tip of your tongue. Every guest should try it!
Guest Message
"After a long day of hard work, I prefer food with a bit more oil and salt. Does your inn have any cuisine with a stronger flavor?"

value.text: Increases all party members' ATK by 81 for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
